definition: not taken into account or excluded from consideration, remote and separate physically or socially
details:
adverb
- not taken into account or excluded from consideration
= example: not taken into account or excluded from consideration
= synonyms: aside
- into parts or pieces
= example: into parts or pieces
= synonyms: asunder
- separated or at a distance in place or position or time
= example: separated or at a distance in place or position or time
- one from the other
= example: one from the other
- placed or kept separate and distinct as for a purpose
= example: placed or kept separate and distinct as for a purpose
= synonyms: aside
- away from another or others
= example: away from another or others
adjective
- remote and separate physically or socially
= synonyms: obscure
- having characteristics not shared by others
